CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c), NOT (ISBLANK(Drawing__c))), CASE(TEXT(Order.Region__c), '3', Drawing__r.DrawingBase__r.Product__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' (' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '19', Drawing__r.DrawingBase__r.Product__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' (' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '13', Drawing__r.DrawingBase__r.Product__r.NameUKR__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' (' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', Drawing__r.DrawingBase__r.Product__r.Name + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' (' + Drawing__r.Name + ')' ), IF(AND(NOT (ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c)), ISBLANK(Drawing__c)), CASE(TEXT(Order.Region__c), '3', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name + ')', '19', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name + ')', '13', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameUKR__c + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name + ')', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name + ')' ), IF(AND(ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c), ISBLANK(Drawing__c)), Product2.ProductKind__r.Name + ' ' + WheelSteelGrade__r.Name + ' ' + WheelProductStandard__r.Name, IF(AND(NOT (ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c)), NOT (ISBLANK(Drawing__c))), CASE(TEXT(Order.Region__c), '3', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '19', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '13', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameUKR__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.Name + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')' ), '' ) ) ) )
